text: Ready or Not is Cantopop artist Miriam Yeung's () third Mandarin solo studio album. It was released by East Asia Music on 8 March 2011. This is also the first Mandarin album Miriam had in eight years. The album includes nine tracks, one of which was featured on the original soundtrack of Perfect Wedding (). Yeasia – Ready or Not album info.
